item.title: weekly picks (Apr 4 week 2025)
item.description:
A WordCloud of 2025 Apr 4th week collection

===This week’s pick===

Score : 12089

  1. 2504.19664v1 Orbital enhanced intrinsic nonlinear planar Hall effect for probing topological phase transition in CuTlSe2 (arXiv)
